archdesc.bioghist: Theodore H. Hinchman (1818-1895) was a Detroit businessman and political figure, married to Louisa Chapin (1824-1907), daughter of Detroit mayor Marshall Chapin. Among his descendants was his grandson Theodore H. Hinchman, Jr., Detroit architect and member of the firm Smith, Hinchman & Grylls.
archdesc.scopecontent: Family Bible of the Marshall Chapin family, containing twelve leaves of genealogical records. The record was continued by the descendants of Theodore H. Hinchman and Louisa Chapin. The Bible was published in 1807, but includes inserted pages from an earlier record.
